title: Capacitor - inserting conductive slab for half d

content.question: An isolated, charged parallel-plate capacitor has charge <math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math> and the absolute value of the potential difference across the plates is <math alttext="the absolute value of delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>|</mo></math>. A slab of conductive material is inserted between the plates such that it fills half of the distance between the plates. Which of the following correctly describes the change, if any, in <math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math> and <math alttext="the absolute value of delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>|</mo></math> as the conductive material is inserted between the plates?

choices.label: Neither <math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math> nor <math alttext="the absolute value of delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>|</mo></math> change

<math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math> does not change, but <math alttext="the absolute value of delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>|</mo></math> decreases

<math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math> increases, but <math alttext="the absolute value of delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>|</mo></math> does not change

<math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math> increases and <math alttext="the absolute value of delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>|</mo></math> decreases

content.answer: <math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math> does not change, but <math alttext="the absolute value of delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>|</mo></math> decreases

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
